metadata.name: Le bin√¥me de Putin : signature edition
metadata.description:
Putin on a silver bear. The original artwork gold Putin on a silver bear is kept at the Kremlin Museum in Moscow. Art Marvel signed by Vladimir.

25 % of the initial sale of this NFT will go to help the refugees from Ukraine.

Original sculpture : weight 2.2 kg, of which 400 grams is pure gold and 1 kg is sterling silver.
This is Vladimir's first digital art work. 

The collection consists of 2 limited pieces and is initially offered through auction.
